name: Neonicum
description:
Neonicum - unusual game, in which you can see something that I did not see before. How we achieved this? We mixed genres, which no one mixed up before us.
This is an unusual combination of space theme, neon roguelike in real time.
The plot, a large number of items, random generation and a variety of opponents will make you immerse yourself in this fantastic reality!
It is important for us to finish our game in order to show the players completely new experience.

A role-playing system allows develop character individually every time. Here are some items from the game. You can find them at different levels, and each item can be of different nature.

Not all rooms have to fight. There are rooms where the player will have to be smart and reaction. For example, you can find room with the lottery or find room with traps.

Thanks to a system of elements, you can upgrade your character as you want it. You can find several levels of modifiers in which the player creates amplifiers.

and much more!
